```{r}
#Importing data:
library(tidyverse)
NYC_film_data <- read.csv("Film_Permits_20251201.csv")
```

```{r}
NYC_tidy <- NYC_film_data |>
  select(Borough, Category, StartDateTime, EventType, SubCategoryName) |>
  filter(SubCategoryName != "Not Applicable") |>
  filter(EventType == "Shooting Permit") |>
  mutate(
    StartDateTime = mdy_hms(StartDateTime),
    Month = month(StartDateTime),
    Day   = day(StartDateTime),
    Year  = year(StartDateTime)) |>
  mutate(Season = case_when(
    Month %in% c(12, 1, 2) ~ "Winter",
    Month %in% c(3, 4, 5)  ~ "Spring",
    Month %in% c(6, 7, 8)  ~ "Summer",
    Month %in% c(9, 10,11) ~ "Autumn",
    TRUE ~ NA_character_))
    
    write.csv(NYC_tidy,"NYC_TIDY.csv")
```
